data.message: Hi If it please you to recover aid account I beg you, it was not hacked a certain Gorane which declares as king of harkeur , and appartir account of the girl he dared to insult some candidates of the presidential our country is the account of one of my knowledge and the latter has even dared to publish nude photos of her that were synchronized from the cell of the girl he destroy the life of this one I beg you are helping to retrieve account or close the account if possible Thank you cordially Elliot Bradley this compte are https://www.facebook.com/therealnounakan.edithsilue?fref=nf Thank you
